2.label: Strobe closed interval
2.description: Relay 1 and 2 closed contacts time interval in strobe mode.

3.label: Strobe open interval
3.description: Relay 1 and 2 open contacts time interval in strobe mode.

4.label: Auto OFF with delay for relay 1
4.description: Relay will turn off automatically after time specified in this parameter. After receiving command ON Relay 1 will be switched OFF automatically with predefined delay.

5.label: Time delay interval for command ON for relay 1
5.description: Relay 1 will be switched ON with predefined delay.

6.label: Time delay interval for command OFF for relay 1
6.description: Relay 1 will be switched OFF with predefined delay.

7.label: Restore to the last known state for relay 1 after power was interrupted.

8.label: Broadband command turn all ON/ turn all OFF settings

options.label: Accept broadband command turn all ON/ turn all OFF
Ignore broadband command turn all ON/ turn all OFF
Ignore broadband command turn all ON, accept broadband command turn all OFF
Accept broadband command turn all ON, ignore broadband command turn all OFF

11.label: Auto OFF with delay for relay 2
11.description: Relay will turn off automatically after time specified in this parameter. After receiving command ON Relay 1 will be switched OFF automatically with predefined delay.

12.label: Time delay interval for command ON for relay 2
12.description: Relay 2 will be switched ON with predefined delay.

13.label: Time delay interval for command OFF for relay 2
13.description: Relay 2 will be switched OFF with predefined delay.

14.label: Restore to the last known state for relay 2 after power was interrupted.

metadata.inclusion: Put the controller into inclusion mode, with security if supported. Connect power to the Z-Wave garage door controller. If already powered click inclusion/exclusion button on garage door controller three times.
metadata.exclusion: Put the controller into exclusion mode, Click the inclusion/exclusion button three times.
metadata.reset: The device is factory reset on exclusion from the network.
